com.turing123.robotframe.multimodal.action

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turing123.robotframe.multimodal.action.Action
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    An Action Object represent an entity will be executed by lower system.
